phrases.original: Any member of the International Christian Churches (ICC) may use this app, but must be properly authorized first. Those who have a church-issued e-mail address are automatically authorized, and can also authorize others.
phrases.translated: Any member of the International Christian Churches (ICC) may use this app, but must be properly authorized first. Those who have a church-issued e-mail address are automatically authorized, and can also authorize others.

phrases.original: To authorize a new user, please verify that they are a member in good standing with the International Christian Churches. Then complete the form below. Doing this will cause a clickable authorization link to be sent to the new user. Once they click on that link, they will be granted full access.
